meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a dialogue.
meanings.sent1: The dialogist shared their thoughts during the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The teacher and student were both dialogists in the classroom conversation.
meanings.sent3: The dialogist in the play had the funniest lines.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled dialogist, weaving words like a master storyteller.
meanings.sent5: The young dialogist's voice resonated with sincerity and passion.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to dialogue or conversation.
meanings.sent1: The dialogist approach helped resolve the conflict peacefully.
meanings.sent2: Her dialogist skills made her a great mediator in disputes.
meanings.sent3: The dialogist tone of the meeting kept everyone engaged.
meanings.sent4: His dialogist style of writing captivated readers around the world.
meanings.sent5: The dialogist atmosphere in the room encouraged open communication.
